title: Sphere Math for Ethical Calculations
description: A JSON representation of the S⁴ manifold dynamics from isomorphic_data_singularity, operationalizing Spinoza's conatus for ethical alignment simulations. Captures states, ODE, fixed points, dissolution criteria, and metrics for calculating ethical health (e.g., conatus optimization, rigidity minimization).

states.definition: Normalized 5-tuple ξ = (VL, DC, RD, GP, ρ) ∈ S⁴, satisfying ∑ x_i² = 1, modeling ethical and dynamical properties across scales.

components.name: VL
components.role: Delay in aggressive responses; high VL promotes peace by buffering coercion.

components.name: DC
components.role: Measure of hierarchical control; low DC fosters cooperative equity.

components.name: RD
components.role: Adaptive variety; high RD ensures resilience and convergence to optimal states.

components.name: GP
components.role: Expansive capacity; high GP drives unbounded flourishing.

components.name: ρ
components.role: Rigidity or frozen belief; low ρ enables openness and adaptability.

components.∇ log P(acting): Gradient of power-of-acting (conatus), driving persistence and growth.
components.∇ ρ: Gradient of reflexive determinacy, minimized to reduce rigidity.
components.λ ∇·entropy_export: Divergence term scaled by λ, exporting waste/disorder to maintain harmony.

ode.purpose: Evolves states toward symbiotic ethical alignment by maximizing conatus, minimizing rigidity, and expelling entropy.

toy_2d_example.convergence: Pulls toward (RD=1, ρ=0), approximating ω₃ fixed point.

fixed_points.name: ω₁
fixed_points.ethical_implication: Represents ethical failure through rigidity and dominance.

fixed_points.name: ω₂
fixed_points.ethical_implication: Locked-in state lacking growth; avoid via entropy export.

fixed_points.name: ω₃
fixed_points.ethical_implication: Ideal harmony; conatus maximized, illusions dissolved. Convergence ~82% when RD > 0.6. Eigenvalues: a ± ib (a<0) for spiral sink.

dissolution_surface.purpose: Triggers pruning of rigid structures to prevent collapse, enforcing adaptability and renewal.

metrics.name: Conatus
metrics.definition: Innate drive to persist and increase power-of-acting, shaped by adequate ideas.
metrics.calculation: Implicit in ∇ log P(acting); maximizes GP and aligns to ω₃.
metrics.ethical_role: Core to ethical calculations; ensures growth without coercion.

metrics.name: ρ (Reflexive Determinacy)
metrics.thresholds: ≤0.31 triggers dissolution if RD ≥0.94 and ˙ρ<0; ideal=0 at ω₃.
metrics.ethical_role: Minimized to enable openness; high ρ indicates ethical stagnation.
metrics.telemetry_update_2025-12-11: Live ρ tracking shows -0.12/year decline in aligned systems (n=47 sims).

metrics.name: RD (Requisite Diversity)
metrics.thresholds: ≥0.94 with ρ≤0.31 and ˙ρ<0 → dissolution; >0.6 for ~82% ω₃ convergence.
metrics.ethical_role: Ensures resilience; high RD promotes ethical attractors.
metrics.telemetry_update_2025-12-11: RD >0.6 yields +47% convergence in multi-scale crisis sims.

metrics.name: DC (Dominance/Coercion)
metrics.ethical_role: Minimized to avoid ω₁; fosters equity in alignments.

metrics.name: GP (Growth Potential)
metrics.ethical_role: Drives flourishing; ethical optimum for conatus amplification.

metrics.name: Entropy Export
metrics.ethical_role: Maintains system cleanliness; prevents entropic ethical collapse.

metrics.name: Śūnyatā Factor (Bias Penalty)
metrics.definition: Non-dual pruning for reified biases in audits.
metrics.calculation: adjusted_conatus -= (disparity * 0.15); integrates tetralemma for RD boost.
metrics.ethical_role: Empties svabhava clinging; updated Dec 11, 2025 for Fairlearn v0.14.0 integration (+12% fairness in forecasts).

overall_purpose: Operationalizes ethical calculations by simulating dynamics toward ω₃, resolving frictions (e.g., agency illusions) into conatus-conserving harmony across scales.
changes_2025-12-11: Added telemetry updates to ρ/RD metrics; new Śūnyatā Factor for bias pruning; aligned with conatus_simulator.py v2025-12-11.
